comments.text: Elidio!
comments.author: Andresa Layane

captions.text:
"Thoughts"!
Daniel, Elidio and José will play.
Stand up. How does it work?

They will start a scene
and every time I ring the bell,

we will know a secret thought
from one of these characters.
I'd like to know your profession, please.

- Mechanical technician.
- Mechanical technician.

'Mechanical technician' is the profession
that will start the "Thoughts Game", now!

So I was on the street and
smoke started to come out!

So there was so much smoke, and
I thought: 'What am I going to do'?

I stopped the car, but I don't
know anything about mechanics,

because I did my nails today, and I
was like: 'I won't do all that work'!

So I brought it here so you
can see what you can do!

Of course. The car is hot because
it's old. What year is this model?
This one? 92!
Really?
Woman!

My car was hot because it was
just like me. Hot for the mechanic!
I mean it, 92!
Mechanic!
Wow, she's ugly as hell!

- Can you get in and start the engine, please?
- I'll start it for you!

Get in.
Start the engine, please...

You see, it's choking,
I don't know what to do!

Wait a minute!
I'll get my tools to...
Mechanic!

I had never seen a
woman with a mustache!
Do you think you can fix this?
Woman!
He touched my elbow!

Elbow!
I want more!
I want more! I want more!
Huh?

- Let's see...
- Mechanic!
She has elephant's elbows!
I never wanted to throw up so much...

Look, if you open the hood...
I can't open the hood...

- Can you open the hood for me, please?
- Sure.
Look, it's so worn out...
Car!

Beacuse of this bitch!
She doesn't step on the clutch pedal!
And I'm so careful with this car...
Look what's in here...
There's a dead dog in the engine!
Car!

A dog and 40 horses!
The bitch killed them!

She doesn't change the
spark plugs, how can I run?

I don't know how it got
in there, that's gross!
Wait... A cat?
I don't know how that happened!
Car!

Get your hand off, man!
Get your hand off!

A rabbit?
What is this, ma'am?
You're my hero!

It's already starting!
How much do I owe you?

- I'm calling the police!
- What do you mean, police?
Mechanic!
What's the police phone number?

Straight from Mexico, José Luis,
ladies and gentlemen!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

ÁLVARO CAMPOS / RICARDO REIS
